DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure cerebral oxygenation cardiac output total shoulder replacement patient undergo general anesthesia ( GA ) positive-pressure ventilation ( PPV ) . We hypothesize cerebral desaturation occur frequently GA PPV , rare GA spontaneous ventilation . We also hypothesize cardiac output usually well maintain GA sit position epinephrine use , decreased cardiac output increase risk cerebral desaturation .
